s0100.chinese: 十二月，楚王陳涉為其御莊賈所殺。
s0100.literal: Twelfth month, Chu King Chen Sheng was killed by his charioteer Zhuang Jia.
s0100.idiomatic: In the twelfth month, King Chen Sheng of Chu was assassinated by his charioteer Zhuang Jia.

s0101.chinese: 魏人 周市略地豐沛，使人謂雍齒曰：「豐，故梁徙也，今魏地已定者數十城。
s0101.literal: Wei person Zhou Shi conquered territory Feng Pei, sent person to tell Yong Chi: 'Feng was formerly Liang migrants, now Wei territory already settled several tens cities.
s0101.idiomatic: The Wei commander Zhou Shi was conquering territory around Feng and Pei. He sent a messenger to Yong Chi: 'Feng was originally settled by Liang migrants. Wei has now secured dozens of cities in this area.

s0102.chinese: 齒今下魏，魏以齒為侯守豐；
s0102.literal: Chi now submits to Wei, Wei will make Chi a marquis to guard Feng;
s0102.idiomatic: If you submit to Wei now, we'll make you Marquis of Feng and let you defend it.

s0103.literal: If not submit, then will slaughter Feng.'
s0103.idiomatic: If you refuse, we'll massacre everyone in Feng.'

s0104.chinese: 雍齒雅不欲屬沛公，及魏招之，即反為魏守 豐。
s0104.literal: Yong Chi fundamentally did not wish to belong to Pei Lord, when Wei summoned him, immediately rebelled to guard Feng for Wei.
s0104.idiomatic: Yong Chi had never wanted to serve Lord Pei anyway. When Wei offered him the deal, he immediately defected and began defending Feng for Wei.

s0105.literal: Pei Lord attacked Feng, could not take it.
s0105.idiomatic: Lord Pei attacked Feng but couldn't capture it.

s0106.chinese: 沛公還之沛，怨雍齒與豐子弟畔之。
s0106.literal: Pei Lord returned to Pei, resented Yong Chi and Feng young men rebelling against him.
s0106.idiomatic: Lord Pei returned to Pei, resentful that Yong Chi and the young men of Feng had rebelled against him.

s0107.chinese: 正月，張耳等立趙後趙歇為趙王。
s0107.literal: First month, Zhang Er and others established Zhao descendant Zhao Xie as Zhao King.
s0107.idiomatic: In the first month, Zhang Er and others installed Zhao Xie, a descendant of the Zhao royal family, as King of Zhao.

s0108.chinese: 東陽甯君、秦嘉立景駒為楚王，在留。
s0108.literal: Dongyang Ning Jun, Qin Jia established Jing Ju as Chu King, located in Liu.
s0108.idiomatic: Lord Ning of Dongyang and Qin Jia installed Jing Ju as King of Chu, with his capital at Liu.

s0109.chinese: 沛公往從之，道得張良，遂與俱 見景駒，請兵以攻豐。
s0109.literal: Pei Lord went to follow him, on the way obtained Zhang Liang, therefore together with him went to see Jing Ju, requested troops to attack Feng.
s0109.idiomatic: Lord Pei went to join him. Along the way he met Zhang Liang, and together they went to see King Jing Ju to request troops for attacking Feng.

s0110.chinese: 時章邯從陳，別將司馬镛將兵北定楚地，屠相，至碭。
s0110.literal: At this time Zhang Han from Chen, separate general Sima Yi led troops north to pacify Chu territory, massacred Xiang, arrived at Dang.
s0110.idiomatic: At this time, Zhang Han was coming from Chen. His deputy general Sima Yi led troops north to pacify Chu territory, massacring the people of Xiang before reaching Dang.

s0111.chinese: 東陽甯君、沛公引兵西，與戰蕭西，不利，還收兵聚留。
s0111.literal: Dongyang Ning Jun, Pei Lord led troops west, fought with them west of Xiao, unfavorable, returned collected troops gathered at Liu.
s0111.idiomatic: Lord Ning of Dongyang and Lord Pei led troops west and fought the enemy west of Xiao, but were defeated. They withdrew, gathered their troops, and concentrated at Liu.
